name: magicmirror-3rd-party-modules
description: This project provides an overview of all MagicMirror² modules and puts the modules through a few tests.

scripts.start: ntl --autocomplete --size 50 --exclude start lint* prepare test automated
scripts.ownList: node create_own_module_list.js && node --run collectMetadata && node --run getModules && node --run expandModuleList && node --run checkModules
scripts.test: node --run test:fixtures && node --run lint && node --run golden:check && node --run schemas:check && node --run test:unit && node --run test:spelling

descriptions.all: Run all scripts (1 till 6) on all modules. Requires a lot of time and storage space!
descriptions.collectMetadata: Script 1+2: Convert the official module list from the wiki into a json file and update the JSON file that collects the GitHub information of the modules.
descriptions.getModules: Script 3: Get all modules with `git clone`. Requires a lot of time and storage space!
descriptions.expandModuleList: Script 4: Extend the module list with information from the package.json. And get an image if one is available and the license is okay.
descriptions.checkModules: Script 5: Perform deep checks with the TypeScript stage.
descriptions.ownList: Test only defined modules. See README.
descriptions.lint: Check this repository for linter and formatting problems.
descriptions.lint:fix: Fix automatically fixable linter or formatting problems of this repository.
